credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Die Grosse Illusion
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On white background, a painted sketch of a man's German military Imperial uniform, with the actual soldier supposedly inside a grey shadow. A print of two clasped hands covers the area where the mouth would be. Inscription is divided in two columns, at left and at right of the central uniform-figure. At left, starting at top: "mit: Jean Gabin  Erich von Stroheim  Pierre Fresnay  Dita Parlo / Verleih: Neue Filmkunst Walter Kirchner / Pradikat Besonders Wertvoll". At right, starting at top: "Die Grosse Illusion / Jean Renoir Buch and Dialoge: Charles Spaak, Jean Renoir Kamera: Christian Matras Musik: Joseph Kosma Produktion: R.A.C. Film Paris".
name: Poster
